info.title: Airmeet
info.description: Airmeet is the fastest growing platform for hosting a rich variety of virtual events. From Hackathons to ice-breakers, panel discussions to workshops, Airmeet's intuitive experience delivers on organisers expectations for a wide range of events and not just conferences.

post.description: Select a trigger from the available options. Setup reminders and alerts based on event registration, attendance, polls, event start and end time
Create an Airmeet in your community

startTime.description: Start time for the event (unix time in miliseconds)
startTime.title: Start Time

endTime.description: End time for the event (unix time in miliseconds)
endTime.title: End Time

timezone.description: Timezone for the event (Canonical TZ name)
timezone.title: Timezone

networking.description: Enable social lounge for the event
networking.title: Networking

tableCount.description: Number of tables in the social lounge
tableCount.title: Table Count

imageUrl.description: Image Url for the Speaker Profile
imageUrl.title: Speaker Image

post.description: Add a speaker to your Airmeet event

sessionStartTime.description: Start time for the session, unix timestamp rounded to minutes
sessionStartTime.title: Session Start Time

sessionDuration.description: Duration of the event in seconds
sessionDuration.title: Session Duration

hostEmail.description: Email of the Airmeet event host
hostEmail.title: Host Email

speakerEmails.description: Emails of all the speakers. Speakers should be added to the Airmeet before creating the session

cohostEmails.description: Emails of all the co hosts. Team members should be added to the community before creating the session
